document.full_text: big hedge funds and speculators cut their bullish bets on commodity markets by $17 billion in the week through tuesday, the biggest bear turn since at least 2009, regulatory data showed on friday.
document.title: bullish funds slash commodity bets by $17 billion: data
lines_and_colors: big hedge funds and speculators cut their bullish bets on commodity markets by $17 billion in the week through tuesday, the biggest bear turn since at least 2009, regulatory data showed on friday.
